qas.question: What percentage of the city's population is Caucasian?
What percentage of the city's population is African-American?
What ethnicity is growing the quickest in New York City?
What percentage of the population identifies as Hispanic?
By what percentage did the non-Hispanic white population decrease?
As of 2010, what percentage made up white people in NYC?
Since what event did the first time black people decline in living in NYC?
Which race of people made it the highest growing ethnicity between 2000-2010 in NYC?
What percentage of Africans make up NYC?

context: The city's population in 2010 was <a0_0><a5_0>44<a5_0/>%<a0_0/> white (<a4_0>3<a4_0/>3.3% non-Hispanic white), <a1_0><a8_0>25.5<a8_0/>%<a1_0/> black (23% non-Hispanic black), 0.7% Native American, and 12.7% Asian. Hispanics of any race represented <a3_0>28.6%<a3_0/> of the population, while <a2_0><a7_0>Asians<a7_0/><a2_0/> constituted the fastest-growing segment of the city's population between 2000 and 2010; the non-Hispanic white population declined 3 percent, the smallest recorded decline in decades; and for the first time since <a6_0>the Civil War<a6_0/>, the number of blacks declined over a decade.
